description: This is a test suite written in Python for the VueTemplate class, which is part of a project scaffolding or initialization framework. It includes fixtures for creating temporary directories and mock templates, and tests for verifying template info retrieval, project initialization, post-processing execution, configuration loading, and template variable substitution.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration data class for project details such as name, version, description, author, type, output path, and parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration representing different project types, including VUE.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Data class encapsulating information needed to initialize a template, including environment commands, build commands, environment variables, init files, etc.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for initializing projects based on templates and configurations.

classes.name: TemplateProvider
classes.description: Class providing access to template files and content.

classes.name: VueTemplate
classes.description: Template class specific to Vue.js projects, supporting methods like get_init_info.

methods.name: load_config
methods.description: Static method to load a project configuration from a JSON or YAML file.

methods.name: get_init_info
methods.description: Method of VueTemplate that retrieves initialization information including commands and environment variables.

methods.name: initialize_project
methods.description: Method of ProjectInitializer that sets up the project based on the provided config and template.

methods.name: wait_for_post_process_completed
methods.description: Method to check or wait for completion of post-processing scripts executing in the project initialization.
